resources.string: 懐かしい人物の集まる喫茶店

150.6
Yadav to Haddin, no run, shuffles across and gets an inside edge off pad towards point
150.5
Yadav to Haddin, no run, looks to pull one going down leg, misses
150.4
Yadav to Haddin, no run, moving in a shade in the air, pushed back solidly to the bowler
150.3
Yadav to Harris, 1 run, pushes a back of a length ball to sweeper cover
150.2
Yadav to Haddin, 1 run, swings a pitched up delivery hard, to deep midwicket
150.1
Yadav to Haddin, no run, goes for the yorker first up, not quite full enough, patted away on the leg side
Final session on day two to begin, how far is the declaration?
